titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should support the development of programs that better prepare students for careers in cybersecurity by actively promoting ethical hacking skills.

Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should support the development of programs that better prepare students for careers in cybersecurity by actively promoting ethical hacking skills.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: Supports public and private partnerships and collaboration across industry, government, and the academic community to provide students with cybersecurity skills.
